website_summaries.verdict: Create trendy manicures at home with these bright colors that give a fun, youthful look to your nails.
pros: Bold, opaque colors that can last weeks with proper application
Make nails thick and strong, resistant to chips and breakage
A good, lower-priced alternative to luxury brands like OPI
Brushes on smoothly despite its thick consistency
cons: Bottles are small and polish may smell odd
These bright colors aren't for those who prefer natural, neutral look
3 coats may be needed for full coverage

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lasting colors!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these colors! I prepped my natural nails by slightly buffing off the surface shine, then applied pH Bonder and non-acid nail primer. Applied two coats, (except yellow required 3 coats), and then topped with non-wipe clear gel top coat. Solid two weeks of no chipping or lifting. If it wasn't for nail growth, I would have kept them on longer. Colors are vibrant and beautiful. I also applied them on to 3 of my friends' nails, with the same result. Would definitely buy again. I attached 2 pictures of the polish. One is with stamping over it, and the other is the use of the yellow polish with nail art on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kousaka-san

customer_reviews.title: Good gel polish
customer_reviews.text: I really like this gel polish, mine did chip after a few days but I didn’t use a base coat, hence the chipping! Be sure to buy a base and top coat. I found a gel polish set/ trio: a base coat, top coat and matte polish here on amazon for no more than $13! Good luck 💅💋
customer_reviews.author: Carlesa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel nail polish! It is so easy to use and it worked well with my uv lamp. You do have to apply a couple of coats but as you can see in the picture ( the blue one was from this kit. The pink was from another brand) It looks very beautiful if you apply and prep correctly! The nail polish bottles are a little small but if you apply the polish thinly than it will last you a long time!
customer_reviews.author: r35473

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So I tried out my gel, the colors are simply gorgeous, exactly like the picture! The bottles are really nice and the set comes with stickers that you can use to mark the bottles. I tried a different color on every nail because I wanted to test them out. It came out perfectly! I couldn't be more happy. The candy pastel colors are perfect for summer. I did have to apply 2 coats which is standard and I used my UV light, they dried quickly and so far no problems at all. I will definitely buy more of this gel.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Venter

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Ok so I have tried another brand of gel polish and it didn’t have much in the way of color selection so I stumbled across this set and WOW!! It is great! Same exact application process, two coats is all I put on my nails (please disregard how bad my cuticles look in the pic ) Anyway, to sum this up these sets are a great price, good color choices, and great quality
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGentleman81

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful nails.
customer_reviews.text: The nail polish last 2 weeks and go on smooth with no problem I have used it three times on different people since I bought it. They love how it doesn’t peel off right away. Definitely buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Worth the buy, beautiful colors, long lasting and I find a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Beckner

customer_reviews.title: Bright beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: These colors are bright springy colors! There is a bright pink, a lighter pink, a light powder blue, yellow, an aqua, and a light purple. I’m wearing the teal color in the pictures below.These colors are perfect for spring or summer. These go on smoothly and very glossy. They hold up well and are fun to wear! Just follow the instructions, use base coat (remember to use UV LED light on between coats of paint), then use the top coat. So you don’t dry out paint, put a drop of it on the bottle and then you’ll know what the colors are without opening them every time.
customer_reviews.author: DDM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Spring and Summer!
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo pretty! I have been wanting a spring/summer nail set for quite a while now but didnt find any that have both pinks and blues that werent tacky looking. The gel polishes are opaque but not thick and goopy. The bottles are on the smaller size but these arent your everyday shades anyway. The colours remind me of macarons or unicorns. The only colour i wasnt a fan of is the yellow but thats just because it looks weird on my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Yi

customer_reviews.title: Colors are vibrant and spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Received my polish in the mail today and couldn’t wait to try. The colors are spot on, looks exactly like the picture. The colors are so vibrant and pretty. The last two brands I bought (Gellen and Modelones) peel after a couple days. I am hoping this brand holds up longer. Though it’s only day one, there is no chipping and no lifting at my cuticles. I will post an update in a week to give my final opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Gel nail polish, under UV light.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Easy to work with. These colors are perfect for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Shantal Villagomez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vibrant Colors
customer_reviews.text: These are the most prettiest colors that are so vibrant. I only used two coats on the example sticks! A UV/LED lamp is definitely needed. I love the way I received them in the mail how they were carefully secured in a styrofoam like box. I can't wait to use them on my clients. I will definitely be ordering more of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hartford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the packaging and colors! Comes with stickers to mark the top of the bottles since you cant tell what colors they are
customer_reviews.author: Min Ko

customer_reviews.title: I love my spring/summer collection polish
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of paying for 30 dollars every two weeks to get my gel nails done. I love the colors options. Its lasted for about two weeks. Which is very typical. When I get my gel nails professionally done it also lasts two weeks. The price is very fair for the colors, top and base coat.
customer_reviews.author: Mountaindew

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really small bottles but really cute colors, as a starting nail tech the bottle size doesn’t bother me since I haven’t started getting my steady stream of clients yet Update! I built my clientele and they LOVED these colors. I used pretty much every single color that was in the collection to the end, now the size bothers me. But for the price gel polish goes for typically I’m not mad.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: Cute Color!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this collection. The colors are intense and durable, beautiful tones to combine with each other. The size of the product is ideal in relation to its price. It dries easily and its finish is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Irene B.

customer_reviews.title: OMG the colors are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I would def buy again. Colors are bright and pigmented. Def more bold than I'm used to but I love them. Would def buy again. Even threw them on my instagram and people have been loving on the colors.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shuten

customer_reviews.title: Great gel polish
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Beautiful and long lasting colors! Very bright, exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McGrane

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors !!!!!! Yellow needs 1 extra coat but so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great Gel Polishes
customer_reviews.text: The gel nail polish set were great. The nail polish quality was perfect, they weren't too thick or see through. I cured the gel polish for 60 sec in my LED light. It was super easy to apply in the end the nails looked great. Two coats were enough of the polish to give it a clean look. would recommend this product to other gel lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol revelesTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Such pretty opaque colors!
customer_reviews.text: The polishes are super bright fun colors perfect for those spring and summer nails! Goes on smooth and opaque! Could probably just do 1 coat for full coverage however, I always use 2.. Polish still went on smooth , not thick even though it covers well! Absolutely love this polish!
customer_reviews.author: kc fossett

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these colors! Application is smooth and easy and the colors are beautiful! I had an issue with the shipping regarding this product (someone stole it and I never actually got the item). I contacted Amazon and was offered a refund immediately when I really wanted the item re shipped. A lovely lady by the name of July reached or to me to inquire about the polish and when I told her what happened to me she resent the polish in the mail (free of charge)! Not only are the colors amazing and long lasting but the customer service is equally AMAZING! I will definitely be ordering more of these colors!
customer_reviews.author: Glorimar Borrero

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Great Price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The polish seems a bit thick but two coats nicely covered the nail with a rich opaque color. Seems to be durable, I've had it on a week now and no peeling or chipping yet. Great price for the set, will defiantly buy another. Picture shows Azure Pink #7004, one nail had nail glitter added during curing.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant!!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are vibrant, not thick and worth the price!! I can’t wait to actually polish my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Dani  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Ignore my shotty paint job but this lavender is perfect! Can’t wait to try the rest of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ignore my shotty paint job but this lavender is perfect! Can’t wait to try the rest of the colors. My favorite part is the fact that it comes with stickers to put on the top to show which color is which. Makes choosing a color much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth heard

customer_reviews.title: Gel polish
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors so pretty leaves them very shine and the lost a long time really recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality polishes!! Comparable to more expensive ones!
customer_reviews.text: I love doing my own gel nails and was looking for a cheap set of decent gel polish so I could try out some new colors. I ordered these and they came very quickly. I have used three colors so far and I have to say they are amazing and have been lasting so long!! I am pleasantly surprised with these polishes! I swear my OPI gel polish and al also a fan of orly and gelish. This Azure set is definitely as good as all of those brands if not better. This is not a paid review or anything this is totally honest. Very impressive gel polish and I highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and make sure you buy their top coat and base coat for best results. the first time I used it, I used a dfrnt top and base coat but it didnt last. The seller reached out to me and when I got the same brand top and base coat, it was so beautiful and lasted much longer. Customer service with this seller is top notch and they will do everything to make sure you're satisfied with the product. I will definitely be ordering more colors
customer_reviews.author: Molz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blue
customer_reviews.text: Love the color beautiful light blue! Not too thick but don’t press the brush on your nail too hard or it will streak.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute colors, great price and stay for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ena

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves Your Nail Polish
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered my daughter three sets of your gel nail polish, and she had ordered a set herself; she says this is the best nail polish is the best she has ever used. She said the polish is very durable; does not chip off, long lasting, and she loves the colors, and such a wide variety. I will continue to order for her.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Schalow

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never tried gel polish on my natural nails until ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never tried gel polish on my natural nails until now, and I don’t think there will ever be any going back. It has been on for a solid week today and the only “spots” I have are from my nails actually growing out! I work stock at PetSmart so I’m not just putting small light things away, I’m moving entire shelves in aisles and bags of food and litter all day and it hasn’t chipped! Definitely worth the investment to get a start up gel set going if you aren’t a fan of the salons!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Lydic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. Easy to use NOT thick like the others. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! First time doing my gel nails at home and they turn out looking nice. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: MelZ

customer_reviews.title: Seems thick in the bottle but goes on pretty smoothly, this is only ONE coat which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems thick in the bottle but goes on pretty smoothly, this is only ONE coat which is crazy, true to the colors In the picture, wish the bottles were a bit bigger though
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: There is included sticker which is can possible to mark color ! Helpful item and great color
customer_reviews.author: Jacob.D.LEE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish arrived and colors are as advertised. The items were packaged well including instructions for use. The seller immediately followed up afterwards to confirm that everything looked good. Today is day 4 of nail polish without chips. So far so good. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. KambreB

customer_reviews.title: Solid Pretty Colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. You can get away with 1 coat for most of them. I had an issue with a couple of the polishes and customer service sent me a replacement set. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Wife has approved
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about nail polish but my wife is happy so if you are a lady you know what it means.
customer_reviews.author: Alimfini

customer_reviews.title: Love It !
customer_reviews.text: beautiful colors and very good quality . Ordered more colors of this brand
customer_reviews.author: Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Small bottles but they are great gel polish, I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Honesty they work like salon gel!! Haven’t had any chipping for 5 days so far and have washed a lot of dishes so you know it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous colors,low pigment ratio
customer_reviews.text: The coors themselves are pretty. The pigments need boosting. 3-4 coats minimum to get a solid color isn't great, especially with how thick it applies. weirdly thick, and it doesn't think well with acetone either. They last long enough, maybe 2.5 weeks. If they ever redo the formula for these I'd give it a go. For now, I just have 6 bottles of gel polish to use for practice blanks.
customer_reviews.author: Valis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, Meh formula.
customer_reviews.text: I’m still a beginner with gel polish. These take 3-4 coats to be opaque and I still get weird thin spots but that might be user error. The colors are very lovely. I’ve only used the purple and teal blue color on my actual nails, I made swatches of the others though. I get about a week before they chip but that’s probably also user error.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: 🌻Professional nail technician review🌻 All bottles came with lids twisted very tightly, with no leaks ! Most colors only took 2 coats for desired look, while others took 3 coats. All cured evenly. Would recommend prepping, and using a base/ top coat to get a salon finish. I included a photo of swatches!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: The polish is old and tacky, so clumpy i threw them all away without use
customer_reviews.author: Dini Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but some colors are not true to pictures
customer_reviews.text: These polishes are great! Very well packaged, and the colors are super bright and opaque. The only negative is that the maroon/burgundy color and the pink are not as pictured. The pink is much more neon and the maroon is a lot lighter (see picture). The other colors are true to the pictures shown. However, I still think both colors are very pretty even if they're not what I expected, and overall I love the quality of these nail polishes. Definitely my new go-to brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The colors are spot on and so pretty
customer_reviews.text: The colors are just like the picture, the brush itself is a little wider than I’m used to and almost seems like the polish is too thin on one of the colors, but others are fine. Customer service from this company was great and exchanged the product for me with no hassle. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Redroses

customer_reviews.title: Bottles are super tight
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure i got a bad batch of polishes. I could not open 4 of the 6 polishes. They were sealed shut. By no means am i weak, i was able to open 2 of them. The rest were just stuck. So bummed. I'm going to return these just because of that. I did not try them on so i can't fully review them.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this set. It was delivered on time and packaged well. The colors really pop - great for spring and summer. Although the bottles are small, as long as you use each color in moderation, you should be able to make them last through the seasons. As far as application, easy to use and I usually get close to 2 weeks before I start seeing any major chipping.
customer_reviews.author: MPV

customer_reviews.title: LOVE AZUREBEAUTY NAIL PRODUCTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about AzureBeauty gel nail products are professional quality from home. These vibrant colors do require attention and patience for them turn out smooth so practice until they do!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture shows! smaller bottles than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The colors were very true to the picture and beautiful. The only downside was they are very small for the price I thought they were the same size as the base and top coat bottles. But my mistake was I didnt read the info properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Things I did not like about your product
customer_reviews.text: (Forgive my English, Spanish is my mother language.) I was not satisfied bying your product. The process to get your advertised results seemed to me to be very unfriendly: a) I was requiered to have available an UV or LED lamp, which I did not have; b) identification of the base or top gell was a nightmare (why not identify each bottle in advance?); c) following a process of "apllying and cure" several times was annouing. I just want to aplly the nailpolish and go... This is not a friendly product. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Vivid Colors
customer_reviews.text: These polishes colors are vivid. No need to put white under these pastels, even the yellow! They have a solid first coat but the second is just the right amount.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Javonitalla

customer_reviews.title: Chips very easily
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear gel because it doesn’t chip as easily, (because ya know, you spend so much time painting your nails, you want them to last) and this is the only GEL polish that has given me issues. They ended up chipping (even after I have properly capped them) after 24 hours or so... which lead my decently natural long nails to break.. sad life Cute colors tho
customer_reviews.author: L. Gnas

customer_reviews.title: Loved This
customer_reviews.text: I really like the first color I’ve had a chance to try. It had great coverage and looked VERY pretty and bright. I will add more pics when I can try more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson, G. P.

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: It's ok l Peels off on regular nails your own nails I meant after I took a bath my nails started peeling don't know on acrylic nails I haven't tried it yet but this product peels off your own nails doesn't stay on
customer_reviews.author: Nevaeh

customer_reviews.title: Nice set bottles are small.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice strong colors. Bottles are very small not a lot of nail varnish in them. I wish the bottles was bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Very Pigmented!
customer_reviews.text: All the colors covered in one coat expect the neon yellow and pink, although that's to be expected with that bright of colors. They applied well and the brushes are soft and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: onadancer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo nice! Pretty candy colors, came in a nice box. Two thin coats gets the perfect opacity and cures in 60 seconds. Absolutely love these gel polishes.
customer_reviews.author: J Riley

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: First of all I just want to say THANK YOU!!! I really love these colors. I have been trying different gels nail polish but nothing compared with this product. I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ceci

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors. However, the nail polish is very streaky. Doesnt look smooth when it is put on. I did my first coat, put it under the light, did my second coat, light again: still streaky. I'm on day 3 if wearing it and it's already chipping. There is also a bubble that formed after putting my nails under the UV light. Who knows, maybe I didnt file my nails enough, maybe 60 seconds under the light isnt good enough. Pretty colors, disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more from this brand
customer_reviews.text: The price is great for how many polishes come in the set. I applied three coats, but two would have looked fine. The consistency is a bit runny for my liking but worked out great. I will definitely buy other colors/sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not pigmented enough
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 2 stars because of the pigment in the lighter colors. I ordered the set because I love all the colors, but can’t wear the yellow, light pink, lilac or blue. I tried them all on at the same time (rainbow nails) and did 3 coats of the light colors, but it still looked patchy. Big shame
customer_reviews.author: MMedina

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased their nude colors and were IN LOVE, thought this would be similar but it’s not and I’m not a fan of them. They’re fairly small, I guess that falls on me for not checking but because I had another color set from them I assumed it would be similar
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Received a USED product
customer_reviews.text: I received a used, and returned item which was missing a whole bottle. If they are sending these to people who order NEW items, then I don’t recommend. Also I ordered colorful ones and they only sent two of the colors actual pictured. The other 3 colors must’ve been out of someone’s collection. They had dots on the back to represent the color and the colors were blue grey, sparkly maroon, and a red gray. Non of those colors were pictured, they all had finger prints and were half filled. 100% don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the colors i guess
customer_reviews.text: These are very tiny for $19 i expected them to be bigger but they are smaller than a quarter. They also are super thick and chunky so i had to get a replacement and send original back. they are beautiful colors though.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you do your gel nails at home
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous colors! I love this brand cause I can get nice gel colors and they are not that expensive and you will get a nice variety of colors. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color
customer_reviews.text: these are a must to anyone who does their nails at home. Ive been doing my own nails at home for a few years and i love trying out what is the best brand. This needs a thick apply but it is amazing! The pic is almost a week of the color on.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Douget

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I really like these colors. It does take 3 coats to have good coverage, but that’s not a deal breaker. The colors are nice and it applies well.
customer_reviews.author: esh

customer_reviews.title: not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: i’m so mad. i got these after reading the reviews thinking they were awesome. i was so wrong. i painted this on my nails LAST NIGHT! i woke up,3 had peeled off and it’s not 9:30 the next morning and they all have peeled off without me even picking at them. i even used a top and base coat. i’m so pissed. not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thoms

customer_reviews.title: Good polish
customer_reviews.text: Love the bottle sizes. I ordered other gel polish when I purchased this one and these bottles are bigger and the polish goes on smoother! I wish they had more colors for me to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: More pastel in person
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful colors but they are more pastel in person then in the picture they wear nicely go on smooth and they last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors but...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful colors! I have used a few of them and just gorgeous BUT I just used the purple for the first time and I am getting so many little fuzzies! I have cleaned the brush off and still getting them with every dip of the brush! Its extremely frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Kello

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: So far I am in love with the colors😍. I could not decide which color to use so I used them all😊. I will give an update on how long will this last.
customer_reviews.author: maricel ona

customer_reviews.title: Fun Colors
customer_reviews.text: Great color options. Ive struggled to get the yellow perfect, takes like 3 layers and then the layers get kind of lumpy (but Im a perfectionist). Love the muted pink and light purple.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice but for the yellow and blue I had to put several coats on and they still were not solid. Next time I use them I will use white underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Corey O

customer_reviews.title: These colors are gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous colors and goes on smooth.. most of them is one coat coverage , some takes 2 thin coats ... totally worth the price and great to do nail art with
customer_reviews.author: Krisandra Beaver (growlingcheetah)

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Loved the colors. On fake nails lasted long. On real nails not too long.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie 💛💚🧡💙❤💜

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I have to use 4-5 tops to get a nice color and it obviously makes it harder to dry or it bubbles and then it chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it !!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the variety of colors very bright also spring / summery very fun colors. I just recently started doing my own nails and I’m glad I went with this color set. Easy and smooth application
customer_reviews.author: Leanne edwards

customer_reviews.title: Gel nail set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set! Goes on very easy. Good coverage with two coats. Very pleased with results.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Krohnert

customer_reviews.title: Mini
customer_reviews.text: These are miniature bottles. A few uses and you'll definitely be buying more. The reviews are saying more than one coat, based off that and the size of the bottles. I sent them back. Never used the product. Too dissatisfied with the size.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The colors are light and cute. The polish is also thin, unlike my other set of gel polish that comes out super thick. Doesn’t last too long especially when washing dishes but lasts much longer than regular nail polish for sure!
customer_reviews.author: jelipsa francis

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Colors are quite the same. Bottles are small and they don’t seem to last as long as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Bridges

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Good & even consistency. This was my first time using Gel polish on myself and i loved it. The color is exactly how it’s advertised. Not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: light colors are pat hy
customer_reviews.text: Colors are pretty but the light colors like yellow took 4 coats to get it to where it was not so patchy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Small bottles, I had To use several coats. The price is great I will order again
customer_reviews.author: SavannahJen

customer_reviews.title: Cute & cheap
customer_reviews.text: The colors are very cute, but this stuff lasts like 3 days before chipping. Very cheap polish.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Not a good brand
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors, but I would not buy this product/brand again cuz the lacquer is very think and doesn't spread evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Shart

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: The colors are as shown. I feel these are high-pigmented, high-quality gel polishes. I would purchase from this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: brooke husing

customer_reviews.title: Very thick gel
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful vibrant colors, but go on really thick. I had to add thinner to the pinks.
customer_reviews.author: racwawin

customer_reviews.title: To thin of coverage colors are pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very opaque takes,5 coats becomes too think. Colors a pretty
customer_reviews.author: Karie Huntley

customer_reviews.title: Nice color payoff
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Nice color pay off. Sometimes I have to do 4-5 thin layers with the cheaper gel polish, but I only needed 2-3 for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long to dry
customer_reviews.text: Takes too long to dry and peels off easily, beautiful colors but wish to last longer
customer_reviews.author: Selene Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Gel Polish
customer_reviews.text: Very thin polish. Have to put it on 3 or 4 times to get a nice color. That's a lot of polish drying per coat under ultraviolet light.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Used all of the pretty colors and the gel polish lasted between 2 to 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The colors in this box of six gel polishes are very nice summer colors.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors just very thick!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the pretty colors but....this is the THICKEST gel polish I’ve ever used. It’s kinda hard to work with but I made it work
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Office

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors but a thin streaky yellow
customer_reviews.text: Loved the collection for the most part! Very rich vibrant colors! However my yellow was EXTREMELY streaky and thin even after 4 coats of it! Very disappointing because the yellow was what made me want to purchase the collection. But the other colors were gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Lala Wyche

customer_reviews.title: Good colors
customer_reviews.text: I tried already all the colors. I’m so happy using these colorful nail polish ! Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Hong Lee

product_meta.title: AZUREBEAUTY Gel Nail Polish Set - 6PCS Sweet Candy Neon Colors Nail Art Gift Box, Soak Off UV LED Manicure Bright Color Starter Kit 0.24 OZ
feature_bullets: ღPACKAGE of Gel Polish: 6pcs 0.24oz 7ml gel nail polish. Know the colors by covering a little on the bottle.
ღGOOD QUALITY: Long time lasting with a proper application,at least 2 weeks.
ღReminder of Gel Application:Cure under UV/LED nail lamp. Average CURE TIME for LED is 30-60S, UV is 2 mins. Work with base and top coat.Don't apply too thick for each coat.
ღSAFE: Non-toxic, minimal smell, non-damaging to nails.
ღCustomer Service: Any problem, pls contact the seller directly, we promise to offer replace or resend service.
